ygData.subject: RE: all I can say is hmmmm
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Congratulations! ... !!  I hadn t noticed this until today. ... Oh I love that!  *wink* I think many people will want to move their gating characters to
ygData.messageBody:
> Sylly Songsynger
> newly minted Virtuoso

Congratulations!

> <this space for rent>

!! I hadn't noticed this until today.

> * do you mean to say that you have not seen the Emperor's new armor? ;)

Oh I love that! *wink*


I think many people will want to move their gating characters to new accounts
;).

Being on Mith Marr, I am wondering how many people who 'escaped' to Drinal will
come flying back now. Some I will be glad to see; some not ;p.

Maravana Vireo
59 (endlessly....) Bard of Deadly Virtues
Mithaniel Marr
